popularityCurve.label: he was an inspiration for me to run

clusterList.phrase: he was an inspiration for me to run
you'd have your battles with him but he was a real nice guy he wasn't afraid to run me hard and i wasn't afraid to run him hard he was a true race-car driver
the minute he died i stopped crying because i became a man and that's what made me strong enough to be a successful racer
that could have pushed me away from racing had he been alive because i've always been a very independent person
but with him running again for that position i really had no interest in challenging him
